Package community.leaf.textchain.adventure

Class Components

java.lang.Object
community.leaf.textchain.adventure.Components
public class Components extends Object
Utilities and constants for working with Adventure components.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static Style
    RESET
    Style constant that explicitly disables most formatting options (all decoration types are set to false), and it's set to white (emulating the "&r" legacy color code).
    static Style
    UNFORMATTED
    Style constant that explicitly disables most formatting options (all decoration types are set to false).

    Description

    Flattens a component's extra components (its children) by applying the provided component's style to each child component.
    static List<Component>
    flattenExtraSplitByNewLine​(Component component)
    Combines and flattens a component's extra components (its children) by first aggregating them until a new line is encountered and then applying the provided component's style to each combined group of children.
    static Component
    safelyAsComponent​(ComponentLike componentLike)
    Safely retrieves the component from the provided component-like by throwing NPEs if null is encountered anywhere in the component conversion process.

  • Field Details

    • UNFORMATTED

      public static final Style UNFORMATTED
      Style constant that explicitly disables most formatting options (all decoration types are set to false). No color is specified, however, so the color from a parent style will still be inherited when it's applied to a child component.

    • RESET

      public static final Style RESET
      Style constant that explicitly disables most formatting options (all decoration types are set to false), and it's set to white (emulating the "&r" legacy color code).

  • Method Details

    • safelyAsComponent

      public static Component safelyAsComponent​(ComponentLike componentLike)
      Safely retrieves the component from the provided component-like by throwing NPEs if null is encountered anywhere in the component conversion process.
      Parameters:
      componentLike - a suspicious component-like (received via input)
      Returns:
      the component version of the provided component-like
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if componentLike or the component it returns is null

    • flattenExtra

      public static List<Component> flattenExtra​(Component component)
      Flattens a component's extra components (its children) by applying the provided component's style to each child component.
      Parameters:
      component - the component with "extra" to flatten
      Returns:
      a list of the component's flattened children

    • flattenExtraSplitByNewLine

      public static List<Component> flattenExtraSplitByNewLine​(Component component)
      Combines and flattens a component's extra components (its children) by first aggregating them until a new line is encountered and then applying the provided component's style to each combined group of children. A child component is eligible to be combined unless it equals Component.newline() (a text component containing only "\n"), in which case a new group of children is started.
      Parameters:
      component - the component with "extra" to flatten
      Returns:
      a list of components generated by combining and flattening the component's children
